title: 4U'LIFE Microwavable Translucent Plastic Deli Container and Lid Combo Pack (8 OZ (PACK OF 15))
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Each container is made of heavy weight polypropylene plastic to secure your premium hot or cold products while on display or in transport. The dependable design withstands repeated use, making these containers and lids a reusable option in commercial settings. Plus, it's even safe for use in low temperature dishwashers for your convenience.

TRANSLUCENT: this product promotes fast product identification, whether on display in a deli case or stored in a refrigerator. Includes Lid The container's durable, curled rim creates a tight seal when used with the polyethylene lid to reduce spills and messes.

MICROWAVE SAFE :This food container can safely be used in the microwave for food service applications. FREEZER SAFE: This food container can withstand low temperature applications and is safe for freezer storage.

DISHWASHER SAFE:This item can safely be cleaned in a commercial dishwasher. STACKABLE : This food container can safely be stacked with identical or indicated items to promote easy transportation and space-saving storage.
BPA FREE: This food container is free of the chemical Bisphenol A (BPA) and is safe for food contact. RECYCLABLE: It is able to be recycled under some recycling programs.
description: Package your pasta salad, soup, or stew with this round deli container and lid combo pack! This combo pack comes complete with an equal number of containers and tight-fitting lids. Use it to package and store food with ease, and it also provides you with an easy way to travle or carrier-out your signature dishes. Both convenient and versatile, Also ,this container and lid combo pack is ideal for any deli, grocery store, or restaurant take-out application.
